events.comment: Character: Ira todo lo referente a mecanicas y animaciones de nuestro personaje principal

variable.comment: distance the stick can move from center
variable.name: radius

action.name: Set value
action.param: distance(MovimientoJoystick.X, MovimientoJoystick.Y, (CanvasToLayerX("HUD", touch.AbsoluteXForID(touchID), touch.AbsoluteYForID(touchID) )), (CanvasToLayerY("HUD", touch.AbsoluteXForID(touchID), touch.AbsoluteYForID(touchID) )) )

variable.comment: distance the stick can move from center
variable.name: radius2

action.name: Set value
action.param: distance(AtaqueJoystick.X, AtaqueJoystick.Y, (CanvasToLayerX("HUD", touch.AbsoluteXForID(touchID2), touch.AbsoluteYForID(touchID2) )), (CanvasToLayerY("HUD", touch.AbsoluteXForID(touchID2), touch.AbsoluteYForID(touchID2) )) )

action.name: Set value
action.param: angle(AtaqueJoystick.X, AtaqueJoystick.Y,(CanvasToLayerX("HUD", touch.AbsoluteXForID(touchID2), touch.AbsoluteYForID(touchID2) )), (CanvasToLayerY("HUD", touch.AbsoluteXForID(touchID2), touch.AbsoluteYForID(touchID2) )) )

sub-events.comment: Desactiva la animacion general, para pasar a usar estas
